Method.name: %OnBeforeSave
Method.Implementation: set strClass="WWWClientParam" set $piece(idKey,",",1)=i%Company set $piece(objRec,"~",1)=i%CoreChangesTCI set $piece(objRec,"~",2)=i%CoreChangesSESAU set $piece(objRec,"~",3)=i%TitleofLoginForm set $piece(objRec,"~",4)=i%CoreChangesSESDF set $piece(objRec,"~",5)=i%CoreChangesSESPE set $piece(objRec,"~",6)=i%CoreChangesHEVA set $piece(objRec,"~",7)=i%CoreChangesIPIRANGA set $piece(objRec,"~",8)=i%CoreChangesALL set $piece(objRec,"~",9)=i%CoreChangesHCB set $piece(objRec,"~",10)=i%HTMLBeforeLoginBox set $piece(objRec,"~",11)=i%HTMLAfterLoginBox set $piece(objRec,"~",12)=i%CoreChangesRVCONTAGEM set $piece(objRec,"~",13)=i%CoreChangesMARKANTI set sc=$$OnBeforeSave^COMObject(insert,strClass,idKey,.objRec) set i%CoreChangesTCI=$piece(objRec,"~",1) set i%CoreChangesSESAU=$piece(objRec,"~",2) set i%TitleofLoginForm=$piece(objRec,"~",3) set i%CoreChangesSESDF=$piece(objRec,"~",4) set i%CoreChangesSESPE=$piece(objRec,"~",5) set i%CoreChangesHEVA=$piece(objRec,"~",6) set i%CoreChangesIPIRANGA=$piece(objRec,"~",7) set i%CoreChangesALL=$piece(objRec,"~",8) set i%CoreChangesHCB=$piece(objRec,"~",9) set i%HTMLBeforeLoginBox=$piece(objRec,"~",10) set i%HTMLAfterLoginBox=$piece(objRec,"~",11) set i%CoreChangesRVCONTAGEM=$piece(objRec,"~",12) set i%CoreChangesMARKANTI=$piece(objRec,"~",13) Quit sc
